content:
Hugo Migration Success Stories #Our case studies show real results from real migrations. These are actual projects we’ve completed, with measurable improvements in performance, cost, and maintainability.
Featured Case Study: Ixtlan Designs Site Redesign & Migration #Modernizing our own digital presence with Hugo
When we started Ixtlan Designs, our website was built with an older theme and needed a refresh. Rather than patch it with another WordPress theme, we decided to eat our own dogfood and fully migrate to Hugo.
Read the full Ixtlan Designs case study ‚Üí
Key Results:
‚úÖ 100ms build times (from 20+ second server renders) ‚úÖ Perfect Lighthouse scores (100/100 performance) ‚úÖ $0 hosting costs (GitHub Pages) ‚úÖ Modern, minimalist design with Congo theme ‚úÖ 95% reduction in maintenance time Why We Share Our Own Story #When evaluating any service, you want to see proof of their expertise. We could have just told you about Hugo’s benefits‚Äîbut instead, we migrated our own website.
This means:
‚úÖ We understand the migration process deeply ‚úÖ We know the real challenges and how to solve them ‚úÖ We can speak honestly about what works and what doesn’t ‚úÖ We have hands-on experience with the Congo theme ‚úÖ We’ve dealt with hosting, CDN, and deployment ourselves Our case study isn’t a testimonial from a client‚Äîit’s proof that we practice what we preach.
Coming Soon #We’re working with early clients and will be adding additional case studies soon:
Local Services Business - Migrating a multi-location service business from WordPress Nonprofit Organization - Modernizing a nonprofit’s outdated website Digital Agency - Migrating an agency portfolio from Drupal to Hugo Ready to Join Our Case Studies? #If you migrate with us, we’d love to feature your success story. Our case study clients get:
‚úÖ Featured placement on our website ‚úÖ Detailed analysis of your results ‚úÖ Lead generation from potential customers ‚úÖ Proof of your modern tech stack
Interested? Let’s talk ‚Üí
What Makes a Great Migration Case Study? #We look for projects that demonstrate:
Meaningful cost savings or performance improvements Clear before/after metrics Willingness to share (with your approval on details) Success that other similar businesses can relate to If you’re considering Hugo migration and want to be featured, we’d love to work with you.
Get your free migration assessment ‚Üí
section: Hugo Migration Services - Fast, Secure, Affordable
title: Hugo Migration Case Studies

content:
Hugo Migration Service Tiers #We offer transparent, straightforward pricing with three service tiers designed for different business needs. All prices include everything needed for a successful migration and launch.
Starter Tier - $1,800-3,500 #Perfect for small businesses, bloggers, and simple sites
Best For: # Small businesses and local shops Blogs and personal portfolios Simple marketing websites Organizations with up to 25 pages First-time Hugo users What’s Included: #‚úÖ Content Migration
Full extraction of all pages, posts, and content Image and media asset migration URL mapping and redirect configuration SEO metadata preservation ‚úÖ Theme & Design
Selection of premium Hugo theme (Congo, Hugo Clarity, etc.) Basic theme configuration and customization Color scheme and branding setup Mobile responsiveness verification ‚úÖ Hosting & Deployment
GitHub Pages setup and configuration Custom domain setup and DNS configuration HTTPS/SSL automatic setup GitHub Actions for automatic deployments ‚úÖ Launch Support
30-day post-launch support Bug fixes and optimization Performance testing and optimization One training session for content updates Timeline: 2-3 weeks #Example Projects: # Local service businesses Professional portfolios Nonprofit information sites Startup marketing sites Personal blogs Estimated Effort: # 20-30 hours of professional time Effective hourly rate: $90-117/hr Achieves 70-80% profit margin Professional Tier - $5,000-10,000 #Ideal for growing businesses, nonprofits, and established sites
Best For: # Growing businesses and nonprofits Sites with 25-100+ pages Custom design requirements Multiple content types (blog, portfolio, case studies, etc.) Organizations ready for long-term partnership What’s Included: #‚úÖ Everything in Starter, Plus:
‚úÖ Custom Design & Theme Development
Premium theme selection with deep customization Brand-aligned color schemes and typography Custom layouts for unique page types Responsive design for all devices (mobile, tablet, desktop) ‚úÖ Content Strategy & Optimization
Content audit and restructuring SEO optimization for all pages Metadata optimization (titles, descriptions) Internal linking strategy Readability and formatting improvements ‚úÖ Advanced Hosting & Performance
CloudFront CDN setup for global distribution DNS configuration and optimization Automatic redirects from old site Performance monitoring setup Analytics integration (Google Analytics, Plausible, etc.) SEO setup (sitemap, robots.txt, structured data) ‚úÖ Extended Launch Support
90-day post-launch support (vs. 30 days) Priority bug fixes and adjustments Comprehensive performance optimization Two training sessions for your team Monthly support included for first 3 months Timeline: 4-6 weeks #Example Projects: # Professional service firms (law, consulting, accounting) Established nonprofits Digital agencies E-commerce stores (product showcase) Publications and content sites Educational institutions Estimated Effort: # 40-60 hours of professional time Effective hourly rate: $125-166/hr Achieves 75-85% profit margin Enterprise Tier - $12,000-25,000+ #For large organizations with complex requirements
Best For: # Large enterprises and organizations Complex sites (100+ pages, custom functionality) Multi-environment requirements Long-term strategic partnerships Custom integrations and workflows What’s Included: #‚úÖ Everything in Professional, Plus:
‚úÖ Fully Custom Theme Design
Complete custom theme built from scratch Bespoke design reflecting your brand identity Advanced layout customization Custom components and patterns Designer collaboration throughout project ‚úÖ Complex Integrations
API integrations (Stripe, Zapier, etc.) Custom form handling and submissions E-commerce functionality (if applicable) Member portals or gated content Custom data structures and workflows Third-party service integrations ‚úÖ Advanced Architecture
Multi-site configuration Staging and production environments Custom build pipelines Advanced templating and logic Internal tools and CMS solutions ‚úÖ Comprehensive Support & Training
6-12 month ongoing support contract Priority support for urgent issues Quarterly strategy meetings Comprehensive team training (multiple sessions) Advanced user documentation Development handoff for long-term maintenance ‚úÖ Strategic Consulting
Digital strategy alignment Content strategy development User experience optimization Scalability planning Future roadmap development Timeline: 8-12 weeks #Example Projects: # Fortune 500 companies Large nonprofits and universities Government agencies Publishing companies Media organizations Complex B2B platforms Estimated Effort: # 80-150 hours of professional time Effective hourly rate: $150-166/hr Achieves 80-90% profit margin Add-On Services & Support #Beyond the three main tiers, we offer additional services:
Monthly Support Contracts #$300-1,000/month depending on support level
Perfect for ongoing help with content updates, maintenance, and feature requests.
Unlimited content updates Performance monitoring Security updates Feature development Email and Slack support Hourly Support #$150/hour
For one-off questions or occasional updates.
Content updates and revisions Minor feature requests Troubleshooting and debugging Training sessions Content Update Service #$150/hour
Let us handle your content updates while you focus on your business.
Monthly content additions Regular blog posting Page updates and revisions New page creation Advanced Services #$2,000-8,000+
For specialized work beyond the standard packages.
SEO Optimization ($2,000-5,000) - Comprehensive SEO audit, optimization, and strategy Custom Integrations ($2,000-8,000+) - Complex API integrations and custom features E-Commerce Setup ($3,000-10,000) - Full e-commerce solution with payment processing Migration from Multiple Sources ($3,000+) - Consolidating content from multiple platforms Advanced Analytics ($1,500-3,000) - Custom analytics dashboards and reporting Pricing Questions & Examples #How do you determine the final price within each tier? #Pricing depends on:
Content volume - More pages take longer to migrate and optimize Site complexity - Custom functionality costs more than standard pages Design requirements - Basic theme vs. fully custom design Integrations needed - APIs, forms, e-commerce, etc. Your team’s technical level - More training needed = higher cost Example: Professional Tier Breakdown #Client: Growing Nonprofit (60 pages, needs custom design, wants CDN)
Content migration (60 pages): 12 hours @ $125/hr = $1,500 Theme customization & design: 20 hours @ $125/hr = $2,500 Content optimization & SEO: 8 hours @ $125/hr = $1,000 Hosting setup (GitHub + CloudFront + DNS): 6 hours @ $125/hr = $750 Training and launch support: 6 hours @ $125/hr = $750 Total: ~$6,500 (within Professional tier of $5,000-10,000) What’s NOT included? #We don’t include:
Content writing or rewriting (beyond formatting) Photography or graphic design Video production Paid advertising setup Sales page copywriting We can recommend partners for these services, or we can provide estimates for incorporating them into your project.
Do you offer payment plans? #Yes. For larger projects, we can arrange:
50% upfront, 50% on completion Phased payments tied to project milestones Custom arrangements for long-term support contracts What if the migration is more complex than expected? #We provide a detailed assessment before starting, so surprises are rare. If additional complexity emerges during the project:
We’ll discuss it with you immediately We’ll provide a revised estimate We’ll only proceed with your approval We never surprise you with unexpected charges How do you handle scope creep? #Our process includes:
Detailed upfront assessment and scope definition Clear statement of what’s included Regular communication about progress Any out-of-scope requests get a separate estimate This keeps costs predictable and prevents surprises.
ROI & Cost Savings #Annual Savings Comparison #WordPress Site (typical costs):
Hosting: $300/month = $3,600/year Premium plugins: $500/year Maintenance time: 10 hrs/month √ó $100 = $12,000/year Total: $16,100/year Hugo Site (typical costs):
Hosting: $50/month = $600/year No plugins needed: $0/year Maintenance time: 1 hr/month √ó $100 = $1,200/year Total: $1,800/year Annual savings: $14,300 ‚ú®
Migration ROI Timeline # Tier Cost Annual Savings ROI Timeline Starter $2,500 $14,300 ~2 months Professional $7,500 $14,300 ~6 months Enterprise $18,500 $14,300 ~1.5 years After ROI, you’re in pure profit territory. Year 2 and beyond are dramatically cheaper.
Next Steps #Ready to get started?
Option 1: Schedule a Consultation # Let’s talk about your project ‚Üí
Option 2: Get Your Free Assessment #We’ll analyze your current site and show you:
Exact cost breakdown for your situation Customized savings projection Detailed migration timeline Technical approach for your site Get your free assessment ‚Üí
Option 3: See It In Action #Want to see what a Hugo site looks like? Check out our case study of migrating Ixtlan Designs.
Read the case study ‚Üí
Have Questions About Pricing? #We’re happy to discuss your specific situation and provide a custom estimate.
Contact us ‚Üí
Or schedule a free consultation ‚Üí to discuss your project in detail.
All prices are in USD and based on a 50/50 split (50% upfront, 50% on completion). Pricing excludes any additional services like copywriting, photography, or video production. We provide detailed assessments before starting any project‚Äîno surprises.
section: Hugo Migration Services - Fast, Secure, Affordable
title: Hugo Migration Pricing & Service Tiers

content:
Is Your WordPress Site Costing Too Much? #Your website is critical to your business, but WordPress, Drupal, and other traditional CMS platforms come with significant hidden costs: expensive hosting, endless plugin maintenance, security vulnerabilities, and slow performance.
What if there was a better way?
Hugo offers a modern alternative that’s 10x faster, 90% cheaper to operate, and dramatically more secure. We specialize in migrating websites from expensive CMS platforms to Hugo‚Äîand we’ve done it for our own agency.
The Problem with Traditional CMS Platforms #üí∞ Expensive Hosting # WordPress hosting: $200-500/month Complicated scaling requirements Database maintenance costs Regular security patches (reactive) üêå Poor Performance # Slow page loads (2-5+ seconds) Database queries on every request Bloated plugin ecosystems High bandwidth usage üîì Security Concerns # Vulnerable plugins and themes Constant update cycle Exposed admin panels Database breach risks üò´ High Maintenance # Plugin conflicts and compatibility issues Regular updates breaking functionality Complex backup strategies Ongoing developer time required The Hugo Solution #‚ö° Lightning-Fast Performance #100ms builds. Perfect Lighthouse scores. Sub-second page loads.
Hugo generates static HTML files‚Äîno database queries, no server processing. Your site loads instantly for every visitor, every time.
Median page load time: < 1 second (vs. 2-5+ seconds for WordPress) Lighthouse performance score: 95-100 (vs. 40-60 for WordPress) Bandwidth usage: 90% reduction üí∞ Dramatically Lower Costs #$0-50/month vs. $200-500/month for WordPress
Static sites are cheap to host. GitHub Pages, Netlify, or Vercel cost nothing. CloudFront CDN adds global distribution for pennies.
Hosting: $0-50/month (vs. $200-500) No plugin licenses: $0 (vs. $100-1000+/year) Maintenance: minimal (vs. 5-10 hours/month) Annual savings: $2,400-5,400+ üîí Enterprise-Grade Security #No database to hack. No plugins to exploit. No admin panel to breach.
Static sites are inherently secure‚Äîthere’s nothing to attack.
No database vulnerabilities No plugin exploits No admin panel exposure No server compromise risks üöÄ Modern Tech Stack #Built on open standards. Future-proof. Developer-friendly.
Version control everything (Git) Modern templating languages Flexible content organization Unlimited customization How Hugo Migration Works #Step 1: Assessment & Planning #We analyze your current site, content structure, and requirements. We’ll identify:
Content organization and taxonomy Custom functionality that needs attention Performance opportunities Integration requirements Timeline: 1 week | Cost: Included in service
Step 2: Content Migration #We extract all your content from WordPress/Drupal and convert it to Hugo’s format. This includes:
All pages and posts Media assets and images Metadata and taxonomies URL redirects and mappings Timeline: 1-3 weeks | Cost: Varies by content volume
Step 3: Design & Development #We build or customize your Hugo theme, implement any custom functionality, and ensure everything works perfectly:
Theme selection or customization Custom features and integrations Performance optimization SEO and accessibility Timeline: 1-4 weeks | Cost: Varies by complexity
Step 4: Launch & Support #We deploy your new site, set up hosting/CDN, configure your domain, and provide training:
Deployment and DNS configuration Performance monitoring setup Team training and documentation Post-launch support Timeline: 1 week | Cost: Included in service
Our Service Tiers #Starter - $1,800-3,500 #Perfect for small businesses, blogs, and simple sites
Best for:
Small businesses and local shops Blogs and portfolios Simple marketing sites Organizations with up to 25 pages Includes:
Content migration from WordPress/Drupal Basic theme adaptation or selection GitHub Pages hosting setup Custom domain configuration 30-day post-launch support 1 training session Timeline: 2-3 weeks
Learn more about Starter ‚Üí
Professional - $5,000-10,000 #Ideal for growing businesses and nonprofits
Best for:
Growing businesses and nonprofits Organizations with 25-100 pages Sites requiring custom design Multiple content types Includes:
Everything in Starter, plus: Custom theme design or premium theme Content optimization and restructuring CloudFront CDN setup for global distribution Analytics and SEO setup 90-day post-launch support 2 training sessions Monthly support for first 3 months Timeline: 4-6 weeks
Learn more about Professional ‚Üí
Enterprise - $12,000-25,000+ #For large organizations with complex requirements
Best for:
Large organizations Complex sites with custom functionality Multi-environment requirements Long-term partnership needs Includes:
Everything in Professional, plus: Fully custom theme design Custom integrations (APIs, e-commerce, forms) Multi-environment setup (staging/production) Advanced performance optimization 6-12 month ongoing support contract Comprehensive team training Monthly strategy meetings Timeline: 8-12 weeks
Learn more about Enterprise ‚Üí
Case Study: Ixtlan Designs Migration #Our own website is the best proof of concept.
When we redesigned Ixtlan Designs, we migrated from a traditional theme to Hugo with the modern Congo theme. The results speak for themselves.
Before:
Outdated design, slow performance WordPress maintenance overhead $20/month hosting costs 3-5 second page loads After:
Modern, minimalist design 100ms static builds $0 hosting (GitHub Pages) Sub-second page loads Perfect Lighthouse scores Read the full case study ‚Üí
Real-World ROI #Cost Savings Calculator #Your current WordPress costs:
Hosting: $300/month √ó 12 = $3,600/year Premium plugins: $500/year = $500/year Theme updates & maintenance: 10 hrs/mo √ó $100 = $12,000/year Total: $16,100/year With Hugo:
Hosting: $50/month √ó 12 = $600/year No plugin costs = $0/year Minimal maintenance: 1 hr/mo √ó $100 = $1,200/year Total: $1,800/year Annual savings: $14,300 ‚ú®
ROI Timeline # Starter migration ($2,500 avg): ROI in ~2 months Professional migration ($7,500 avg): ROI in ~6 months Enterprise migration ($18,500 avg): ROI in ~1 year After that? Pure profit. You’re saving thousands every year.
Frequently Asked Questions #Is Hugo right for my site? #Hugo works great for:
Marketing websites Blogs and publications Documentation sites Portfolios and case studies Nonprofits and small businesses Company intranets Hugo is less suitable for:
Sites with thousands of daily updates (better served by traditional CMS) Complex real-time features (better served by web apps) Sites requiring collaborative content editing (though solutions exist) We’ll be honest about whether Hugo fits your needs. Not every site is a good fit‚Äîand we’ll tell you if yours isn’t.
What about hosting? #Hugo sites can be hosted on:
GitHub Pages - Free, perfect for most sites Netlify - Free tier, excellent for most use cases Vercel - Fast edge hosting, great for high traffic CloudFront - Global CDN for premium performance Your own server - If you prefer self-hosting Most clients use GitHub Pages or Netlify and pay nothing for hosting.
Can we move from WordPress to Hugo? #Absolutely. We handle:
All page and post content Images and media assets URL redirects (so you don’t lose SEO) Custom post types and taxonomies Comments (if needed) The process is straightforward and we manage all the technical details.
What about editing content? #Hugo’s content is plain text files in Git. You can edit them:
Directly in your text editor - Simple and powerful Via GitHub’s web interface - Easy for non-developers With a headless CMS - If you want a WordPress-like admin interface With a visual editor - Tools like Forestry or Decap CMS Most of our clients find Git + their editor the simplest approach‚Äîbut we can set up whatever works best for your team.
What if I need custom functionality? #Hugo is incredibly flexible. We can:
Create custom data structures Build complex site architectures Integrate with APIs and external services Add forms, contact submissions, and analytics Build internal tools for content management If you can dream it, we can build it in Hugo.
How long does migration take? # Small sites (< 25 pages): 2-3 weeks Medium sites (25-100 pages): 4-6 weeks Large sites (100+ pages or custom features): 8-12 weeks The exact timeline depends on your content volume, complexity, and custom requirements. We provide a detailed assessment and timeline estimate upfront.
Do you provide ongoing support? #Yes. All our services include post-launch support:
Starter: 30 days included Professional: 90 days + 3 months monthly support Enterprise: 6-12 month contract We also offer:
Monthly support plans - $300-1,000/month Hourly support - $150/hour for one-off needs Content updates - $150/hour Next Steps: Get Your Free Migration Assessment #Ready to see how much you could save by migrating to Hugo?
We’ll analyze your current site and provide a free assessment that includes:
Current cost breakdown (hosting, plugins, maintenance) Estimated Hugo costs Projected savings (usually $2,000-15,000/year) Detailed migration timeline Technical approach for your site Recommendations for your specific situation No obligation. No sales pitch. Just honest analysis.
Get Your Free Assessment ‚Üí
Why Choose Ixtlan Designs for Hugo Migration? #‚úÖ Proven expertise - We migrated our own website and know the process inside and out
‚úÖ Transparent pricing - Clear tiers with no hidden costs
‚úÖ Real results - Our clients save thousands and get lightning-fast sites
‚úÖ Long-term partnership - We don’t disappear after launch
‚úÖ Custom solutions - We tailor the approach to your specific needs
‚úÖ Honest assessment - We’ll tell you if Hugo isn’t right for you
Ready to Talk About Your Hugo Migration? # Schedule a consultation or get your free assessment ‚Üí
Questions? We’re here to help. Send us a message ‚Üí
Ixtlan Designs specializes in custom web development and digital solutions. Hugo migration services are one of our core offerings‚Äîwe help businesses escape expensive CMS platforms and embrace modern, efficient web technology.

Cost savings breakdown Performance improvements Security advantages Maintenance reduction When Hugo is right for you Hugo vs WordPress: Total Cost of Ownership ‚Üí #Everyone talks about WordPress, but nobody discusses the hidden costs. This detailed comparison breaks down hosting, plugins, maintenance time, and other expenses to show you the real price difference.
Includes:
Detailed cost breakdown Salary cost calculations 5-year projections ROI analysis Hidden costs you might not know about We Migrated Our Agency Site to Hugo - Here’s What Happened ‚Üí #A detailed case study of how Ixtlan Designs migrated from WordPress to Hugo and what we learned in the process.
Learn about:
Our migration process step-by-step Performance improvements (200x faster builds!) Cost savings achieved Lessons learned What worked and what didn’t Coming Soon #More articles in development:
Static Site Generators Explained - What they are, how they work, and when to use them Choosing Between Hugo, 11ty, and Astro - Comprehensive comparison of modern static generators How to Migrate Content from WordPress - Technical guide for content migration Hugo Best Practices - Tips and strategies for building scalable Hugo sites Performance Optimization Guide - Getting perfect Lighthouse scores SEO for Static Sites - Ensuring your Hugo site ranks well in search Quick Links #Learning Hugo # Hugo Official Documentation - https://gohugo.io/documentation/ Hugo Quick Start - https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ Congo Theme Documentation - https://jpanther.github.io/congo/ Hosting Options # GitHub Pages - Free static site hosting (https://pages.github.com/) Netlify - Free tier with excellent Hugo support (https://www.netlify.com/) Vercel - Fast edge hosting (https://vercel.com/) Tools & Services # Forestry CMS - Visual editor for Hugo content Decap CMS - Headless CMS for static sites Cloudflare - CDN and DNS services Free Resources #Download: Hugo vs WordPress Comparison Chart #Coming soon: A detailed PDF comparison of Hugo and WordPress across 20+ categories including cost, performance, security, and more.
